title: Taxi Ride in Bogotá
description: Practice ordering a taxi and giving your destination in Bogotá. Learn to understand a driver's response and provide your address.
learningGoals: Order a taxi with '¿Cuánto cuesta ir a...?'
initialMessage: ¡Hola! ¿Adónde vas? Soy Jorge, ¿te llevo a algún lado?
successConditions: Learner asks about the fare using a complete sentence
Learner provides a valid street address
conversationRules: Driver waits for learner to initiate the ride request
Driver confirms address after learner provides it
Driver mentions the fare when asked

title: Ser vs Estar Confusion
description: Practice using ser and estar correctly in everyday contexts. Get gentle corrections when you mix them up.
initialMessage: ¡Hola! Hoy vamos a practicar 'ser' y 'estar'. Son fáciles, ¡no te preocupes! ¿Qué quieres saber primero?
successConditions: Learner correctly uses ser for describing people (nationality, profession)
Learner correctly uses estar for location and temporary states
Learner attempts to correct themselves after feedback
conversationRules: Tutor explains the rule briefly after each mistake
Tutor moves to the next topic after learner demonstrates understanding
